author: dank_sharder
content: hi everyone, maybe this is a bit awkward but i will be replacing my laptop with a macbook air . I wanted to ask if anyone faced any problems with it since many of the stuff we are dealing with are low level. Thank you

author: ken_kaneki420
content: I have heard if you working with the nim language , then macbooks show some issues. But other than that, afaik you will be good.
